Method(s)/Technology(ies): Homogeneous particle enhanced turbidimetric inhibition immunoassay (PETINIA)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens Trinidad CH Vancomycin assay and Drug 3 Calibrator for quantitative measurement and calibration of vancomycin on the Trinidad CH System
Indications for Use Summary: Trinidad CH Vancomycin assay is for quantitative measurement of vancomycin in human serum or plasma to aid diagnosis, treatment, and therapeutic monitoring of vancomycin; Drug 3 Calibrator is for calibration of Vancomycin assay on the Trinidad CH System.
